resources.string:
To make sure that the application accurately recognizes sounds, play the sounds below from another device, bringing the tested application under its speaker 
 
 1st string (E): 
 https://akkordam.ru/audio/august/1str.MP3 
 2nd string (B): 
 https://akkordam.ru/audio/august/2str.MP3 
 3rd string (G): 
 https://akkordam.ru/audio/august/3str.MP3 
 4th string (D): 
 https://akkordam.ru/audio/august/4str.MP3 
 5th string (A): 
 https://akkordam.ru/audio/august/5str.MP3 
 6th string (E): 
 https://akkordam.ru/audio/august/6str.MP3
